Constructor Detail

ClassifierPanelRemoteLauncher.ClassifierTask

public ClassifierPanelRemoteLauncher.ClassifierTask(Classifier classifier,
                                                    boolean saveVis,
                                                    boolean pointSizePropToMargin,
                                                    AbstractOutput outputCollector,
                                                    CostMatrix costMatrix)
Constructor.

Parameters:
classifier - the classifier to use
saveVis - whether to save visualization data or not
pointSizePropToMargin - whether to set the point size for classifier error plots proportional to the prediction margin.
outputCollector - output collector for accumulating textual output
costMatrix - cost matrix to use (if any)

public TaskStatusInfo getTaskStatus()
Clients should be able to call this method at any time to obtain information on a current task.
